title: Homeric Hymns To the Muses and Apollo 1

title: Homeric Hymns To the Muses and Apollo

title: Homeric Hymns To the Muses and Apollo 1
body: comparison with and as alternative to the hymnic start of the arkhaia Ilias cited by Crates of Mallos, in the context of the analysis and comparison of the beginnings of the arkhaia Ilias and of the Homeric Iliad that has come down to us [MRBTP: complete text]

title: Homeric Hymns To the Muses and Apollo 6-7
body: example of allēs … aoidēs as meaning not ‘another song’ but ‘the rest of the song’, in the context of the analysis of hymnic moments of metabasis
